name: Bot-sa Nova
description:
Bot-sa Nova

Our entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Click and Drag with the Mouse to connect robots
  • Click on an already connected robot to sever its connection
  • Press 'R' to restart

Credits:

Programming

  • Conner Arrington (@EraserLark)
  • Tobius Saint
